title: Gymnastics Stars Call for Ouster of U.S. Olympic Directors
sub_head: Simone Biles, McKayla Maroney, Maggie Nichols and Aly Raisman are asking Congress to dissolve the U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee’s Board
body:
WASHINGTON—A group of star gymnasts on Wednesday stepped up their attack on the U.S. Olympics & Paralympic Committee by asking Congress to dissolve the organization’s board over its alleged failings in handling the Larry Nassar sex abuse scandal.
Simone Biles, McKayla Maroney, Maggie Nichols and Aly Raisman—who between them have an extensive collection of Olympic, world and NCAA titles—
